Pre-Game Insights: Tyrese Maxey is averaging 25.5 points, 5.7 assists and 2.1 steals for the 76ers.
The Pelicans average 11.6 made 3-pointers per game this season, 1.7 fewer made shots on average than the 13.3 per game the 76ers give up.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The 76ers have gone 6-10 in home games.
The Pelicans are 2-15 on the road.
New Orleans is 3-19 against opponents over.500.
Others: The 76ers average 107.4 points per game, 9.8 fewer points than the 117.2 the Pelicans give up.
The 76ers have a 6-13 record in games decided by 10 points or more.
The Pelicans average 111.7 points, 41.6 rebounds, 27.8 assists, 10.6 steals and 6.0 blocks per game while shooting 44.9% from the field.
